This pull request **introduces 1 alert** and **fixes 1** when merging 3447859ce9c6bfeda331771d48fc08970b261d0b into 2bcdb62d957637f5401effaecc8fb6fc6b1c29a8 - [view on LGTM.com](https://lgtm.com/projects/g/apache/kylin/rev/pr-486123b54f7d66eeb02e2642f12b9547b76da736)

**new alerts:**

* 1 for Result of multiplication cast to wider type

**fixed alerts:**

* 1 for Dereferenced variable may be null

## Test Evidence - First, we configure hbase.client.keyvalue.maxsize to 1KB. - Then we restart kylin. Check the setting of the hbase.client.keyvalue.maxsize and kvSizeLimit in log after kylin is up. We should see that "hbase.client.keyvalue.maxsize is 1024, kvSizeLimit is set to 10485760" - Then we build a cube with size larger than 1KB. We can see that kylin_sales_cube has size 6432>1024. - Then we check HDFS and make sure that kylin_sales_cube.json is not written in HDFS.
PTAL @hit-lacus
